page.title: 16FEERING FALCONS F.C.
page.content: I'm a member of Feering Falcons. Our manager is Tony Murray. Every week we go to the park on saturday mornings. We train on wednesdays in the Autumn.On saturday we run round the field four times, then do some exercises and then play a match. There are two teams, the A team and the B team, I am in the A team.Here are some of our best players:-{ {JAMIE WILLOWS, LEE MURRAY, ANTHONY {LONG, MARTYN GRIMWOOD, MATTHEW {BUTCHER, DAVID PHILLIPS and PAUL {HORNIGOLD.} I play centre-forward and I like football because it gives me an opportunity to be a good player.
